blocks.content: Shift is an Android app my friend and I developed in our spare time, eventually releasing an Alpha version on Google Play. The concept was simple but powerful: take your to-do list and intelligently slot each task into the open gaps in your calendar, creating a streamlined, automated daily schedule.

Built with a focus on usability and time management, Shift aimed to reduce decision fatigue by helping users visualize their day and prioritize tasks without manual planning.
